summary: This document contains various banking and corporate resolutions related to the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc. It includes details about account opening procedures, signatures of key individuals, and the establishment of banking authority for the foundation. The document outlines the roles of Jeffrey E. Epstein and Jeffrey A. Schantz within the organization. This document contains financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein and the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation Inc. It includes account details, balances, and information about the banking relationship with FirstBank. The records indicate significant financial activity and account management details. This document contains corporate resolutions for the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc., including the authorization of bank accounts and signatories. It outlines the powers granted to officers of the corporation and certifies the appointment of Jeffrey Epstein and others as officers. This document contains various financial compliance checks and due diligence requirements for high-risk business accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein and the Virgin Islands Foundation. It includes observations from a visit to a business location, details on account opening procedures, and compliance with banking regulations. This document contains various records related to the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, including verification checks, tax exemption status, and corporate resolutions. It outlines the foundation's compliance with federal tax regulations and its good standing in the Virgin Islands. The document also includes details about the foundation's employer identification number and its operational guidelines.
